data.text: @callmesjzbzmsk Hi callmesjzbzmsk! Tel here. May I ask for the complete flight schedule - flight date/time/route/flight number? Thank you!

@skz_kyle Hi Kyle. Flight 5j822/29Oct is cancelled. You may also check the status of your flight through this link: (https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS). To view your options, please refer to this link: https://t.co/k9grG8YJsw. Thanks!
For other questions or concerns, passengers may send a message via Charlie the chatbot on https://t.co/SCMZemThl1
CEB will do its best to inform guests ahead of time if flights are cancelled. If these are done on-the-spot, our ground staff are on standby to assist affected guests.
We continue to monitor the situation across all the airports we fly to. Everyjuan’s safety remains our top priority.
This is a developing situation. As such, there may be more flight changes as the Typhoon passes. Guests are urged to check real-time flight status updates via https://t.co/n8RpsOuboq

2. Travel Fund 

Store the amount in a virtual CEB wallet valid for six (6) months and use this to either book a new flight or pay for add-ons (example: baggage allowance, seat selection, etc.) 

3. Refund 

The process may take up to two (2) months from the date of request.

data.text:
1. Free Rebooking 

Rebook without fare difference for travel up to thirty (30) days from original flight date. The fare difference will apply if travel period is beyond thirty (30) days from the original flight date.
Affected passengers have been informed and provided with the following options through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR:

@iamkeitarou For now, we may provide you the consideration as a one-time courtesy. May we request you to send us again a message for this concern so we can assist you further. Thank you
@iamkeitarou Hi Keith, kindly note that we are indeed implementing the non-waiving of the rebooking fee effective November 1, 2022.

@_rosaLynp Hi there nylasor! Thanks for reaching to us. To monitor/check the status of your flight, you may refer to https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS. Or for any travel advisory, kindly visit https://t.co/KuymGz608i. Thank you!
@gmarants Thanks for the understanding, Igene. Have a good day!
@norwejean You're welcome! Have a great day ahead!
@gmarants Thanks for providing the email address. A follow-up has been sent also to the relevant team. Kindly monitor the email for any response from them. Thank you

@TyJazzumin We are sorry to hear your frustrations, Jazzumin. For us to check on your concern and to assist as well, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@norwejean There's no specific dimension for the small bag on top of your hand carry, jed. Ideal would be 35cmx20cmx20cm which can fit under the seat. Thank you.

@nikkamerro We are sorry to hear this, NIkka. To monitor the status of your flight, you may refer to https://t.co/n8RpsOd8mq. Or for any travel advisory, kindly visit https://t.co/KuymGz6xXQ. Thank you!

@superkaatee We are sorry to hear your frustrations, KF. For us to assist you and to check on your concern further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@IAmEsstherRJill Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Esther. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@heylulutweets Hi Lu! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@gmarants We are sorry to hear your frustrations. Appreciate if you can provide us the email address used? Thank you

@wrapbyun Hi @wrapbyun! Note that every passenger is only allowed one (1) carry-on baggage inside the cabin, with a maximum weight of seven (7) kilograms and dimension of up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm. Some exemptions are applied also. For more details, please refer to https://t.co/A4HuYKGoUw.
@gmarants We are sorry to hear this, Igene. May we ask for the Customer Care Reference Number of the email you sent so we can check o it? Thank you

@MARTIN17556980 Thanks for raising the concern and we are also sorry for the inconvenience, Martin. To assist and check on your concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there. Have a good day!
@barbaraababe Hi @barbaraababe! Item may only be allowed to be included in your checked baggage. Thank you

data.text: @frapwrites Got this Paula. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update.
